mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as appId from dual
insert into d_app ( `APP_ID`, `LOAD_URL`, `COMBINE_APP_ID`, `COMBINE_TIME`, `ICON_URL`, `CODE_QR_A`, `CODE_QR_B`, `CODE_QR_C`, `CREATE_TIME`, `MODIFY_TIME`, `APP_NAME`, `APP_KEY`, `BUNDLE_NAME`, `BUNDLE_ID`, `SHORT_URL`, `EXPIRER_TIME`, `APP_TYPE`, `IS_COMBINE`, `DESCRIPTION` ) values ( #{appId}, #{loadUrl}, #{combineAppId}, #{combineTime}, #{iconUrl}, #{codeQrA}, #{codeQrB}, #{codeQrC}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{appName}, #{appKey}, #{bundleName}, #{bundleId}, #{shortUrl}, #{expirerTime}, #{appType}, #{isCombine}, #{description} )
mapper.delete:
delete from d_app where APP_ID in
#{appIds}
